desc: The book is a compilation of high-quality scientific papers presented at the 3rd International Conference on Computer & Communication Technologies (IC3T 2016). The individual papers address cutting-edge technologies and applications of soft computing, artificial intelligence and communication. In addition, a variety of further topics are discussed, which include data mining, machine intelligence, fuzzy computing, sensor networks, signal and image processing, human-computer interaction, web intelligence, etc. As such, it offers readers a valuable and unique resource.

details.authors: Suresh Chandra Satapathy, Vikrant Bhateja, K. Srujan Raju, B. Janakiramaiah

title: Data Engineering and Intelligent Computing: Proceedings of IC3T 2016 (Advances in Intelligent Systems and Computing)
